anya-e0101n7:122_0: Yasmā pana tīsu bhavesu taṇhāsaṅkhātaṁ gamanaṁ anena vantaṁ,
anya-e0101n7:122_1: tasmā bhavesu vantagamanoti vattabbe bhavasaddato bhakāraṁ gamanasaddato gakāraṁ vantasaddato vakārañca
anya-e0101n7:122_2: dīghaṁ katvā ādāya bhagavāti vuccati yathā loke mehanassa khassa mālāti vattabbe mekhalāti.
anya-e0101n7:123_1: Tassevaṁ iminā ca iminā ca kāraṇena so bhagavā arahaṁ…pe…
anya-e0101n7:123_2: iminā ca iminā ca kāraṇena bhagavāti buddhaguṇe anussarato neva tasmiṁ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṁ cittaṁ hoti,
anya-e0101n7:123_5: Ujugatamevassa tasmiṁ samaye cittaṁ hoti tathāgatamārabbha.
anya-e0101n7:123_6: Iccassa evaṁ rāgādipariyuṭṭhānābhāvena vikkhambhitanīvaraṇassa kammaṭṭhānābhimukhatāya ujugatacittassa buddhaguṇapoṇā vitakkavicārā pavattanti.
anya-e0101n7:123_10: Sukhino buddhaguṇārammaṇaṁ hutvā cittaṁ samādhiyatīti anukkamena ekakkhaṇe jhānaṅgāni uppajjanti.
anya-e0101n7:123_11: Buddhaguṇānaṁ pana gambhīratāya nānappakāraguṇānussaraṇādhimuttatāya vā appanaṁ appatvā upacārappattameva jhānaṁ hoti.
anya-e0101n7:123_12: Tadetaṁ buddhaguṇānussaraṇavasena uppannattā buddhānussaticceva saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
anya-e0101n7:124_0: Imañca pana buddhānussatiṁ anuyutto bhikkhu satthari sagāravo hoti sappatisso,
anya-e0101n7:124_5: Buddhaguṇānussatiyā ajjhāvutthañcassa sarīrampi cetiyagharamiva pūjārahaṁ hoti.
anya-e0101n7:124_7: Vītikkamitabbavatthusamāyoge cassa sammukhā satthāraṁ passato viya hirottappaṁ paccupaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0101n7:129_1: Dhammānussatiṁ bhāvetukāmenāpi rahogatena paṭisallīnena “svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo sandiṭṭhiko akāliko
anya-e0101n7:129_2: ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattaṁ veditabbo viññūhī”ti evaṁ pariyattidhammassa ceva navavidhassa ca lokuttaradhammassa
anya-e0101n7:130_0: 147.Svākkhātoti imasmiṁ hi pade pariyattidhammopi saṅgahaṁ gacchati,
anya-e0101n7:130_2: Tattha pariyattidhammo tāva svākkhāto ādimajjhapariyosānakalyāṇattā sātthasabyañjanakevalaparipuṇṇaparisuddhabrahmacariyappakāsanattā ca.
anya-e0101n7:130_14: veneyyānaṁ anurūpato atthassa aviparītatāya ca hetudāharaṇayuttato ca majjhekalyāṇaṁ,
anya-e0101n7:131_0: Sakalopi sāsanadhammo attano atthabhūtena sīlena ādikalyāṇo,
anya-e0101n7:131_9: Taṁ sutvā tathatthāya paṭipannena adhigantabbāya abhisambodhiyā vā ādikalyāṇo,
anya-e0101n7:132_0: Suyyamāno cesa nīvaraṇavikkhambhanato savanenapi kalyāṇameva āvahatīti ādikalyāṇo,
anya-e0101n7:132_1: paṭipajjiyamāno samathavipassanāsukhāvahanato paṭipattiyāpi kalyāṇaṁ āvahatīti majjhekalyāṇo,
anya-e0101n7:132_2: tathāpaṭipanno ca paṭipattiphale niṭṭhite tādibhāvāvahanato paṭipattiphalenapi kalyāṇaṁ āvahatīti pariyosānakalyāṇoti
anya-e0101n7:133_0: Yaṁ panesa bhagavā dhammaṁ desento sāsanabrahmacariyaṁ maggabrahmacariyañca pakāseti nānānayehi dīpeti,
anya-e0101n7:134_3: nirupakkilesato nittaraṇatthāya pavattito lokāmisanirapekkhato ca parisuddhanti evaṁ sātthasabyañjanakevalaparipuṇṇaparisuddhabrahmacariyappakāsanato
anya-e0101n7:135_1: Yathā hi aññatitthiyānaṁ dhammassa attho vipallāsamāpajjati,
anya-e0101n7:135_5: na tathā bhagavato dhammassa attho vipallāsamāpajjati.
anya-e0101n7:135_7: ime dhammā niyyānikāti evaṁ vuttadhammānaṁ tathābhāvānatikkamanatoti.
anya-e0101n7:136_0: Lokuttaradhammo pana nibbānānurūpāya paṭipattiyā paṭipadānurūpassa ca nibbānassa akkhātattā svākkhāto. Yathāha –
anya-e0101n7:136_1: “supaññattā kho pana tena bhagavatā sāvakānaṁ nibbānagāminī paṭipadā saṁsandati nibbānañca paṭipadā ca.
anya-e0101n7:136_2: Seyyathāpi nāma gaṅgodakaṁ yamunodakena saṁsandati sameti,
anya-e0101n7:136_3: evameva supaññattā tena bhagavatā sāvakānaṁ nibbānagāminī paṭipadā saṁsandati nibbānañca paṭipadā cā”ti.
anya-e0101n7:136_4: Ariyamaggo cettha antadvayaṁ anupagamma majjhimā paṭipadābhūtova “majjhimā paṭipadā”ti akkhātattā svākkhāto.
anya-e0101n7:136_6: Nibbānaṁ sassatāmatatāṇaleṇādisabhāvameva sassatādisabhāvavasena akkhātattā svākkhātanti evaṁ lokuttaradhammopi svākkhāto.
anya-e0101n7:137_0: 148.Sandiṭṭhikoti ettha pana ariyamaggo tāva attano santāne rāgādīnaṁ abhāvaṁ karontena ariyapuggalena sāmaṁ daṭṭhabboti sandiṭṭhiko.
anya-e0101n7:137_12: Apica navavidhopi lokuttaradhammo yena yena adhigato hoti,
anya-e0101n7:137_13: tena tena parasaddhāya gantabbataṁ hitvā paccavekkhaṇañāṇena sayaṁ daṭṭhabboti sandiṭṭhiko.
anya-e0101n7:137_20: evaṁ navavidhopi lokuttaradhammo sandiṭṭhiyā jayatīti sandiṭṭhiko.
anya-e0101n7:138_4: Lokuttaradhammo hi bhāvanābhisamayavasena sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena ca dissamānoyeva vaṭṭabhayaṁ nivatteti.
anya-e0101n7:139_1: Attano phaladānaṁ sandhāya nāssa kāloti akālo.
anya-e0101n7:139_3: Na pañcāhasattāhādibhedaṁ kālaṁ khepetvā phalaṁ deti,
anya-e0101n7:139_4: attano pana pavattisamanantarameva phaladoti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0101n7:139_5: Atha vā attano phaladāne pakaṭṭho kālo patto assāti kāliko. Ko so?
anya-e0101n7:139_7: Ayaṁ pana samanantaraphalattā na kālikoti akāliko.
anya-e0101n7:140_1: “Ehi passa imaṁ dhamma”nti evaṁ pavattaṁ ehipassavidhiṁ arahatīti ehipassiko.
anya-e0101n7:140_4: Rittamuṭṭhiyaṁ hi hiraññaṁ vā suvaṇṇaṁ vā atthīti vatvāpi “ehi passa ima”nti na sakkā vattuṁ. Kasmā?
anya-e0101n7:140_6: Vijjamānampi ca gūthaṁ vā muttaṁ vā manuññabhāvappakāsanena cittasampahaṁsanatthaṁ “ehi passa ima”nti na sakkā vattuṁ.
anya-e0101n7:140_7: Apica kho pana tiṇehi vā paṇṇehi vā paṭicchādetabbameva hoti. Kasmā?
anya-e0101n7:140_9: Ayaṁ pana navavidhopi lokuttaradhammo sabhāvatova vijjamāno vigatavalāhake ākāse sampuṇṇacandamaṇḍalaṁ
anya-e0101n7:140_10: viya paṇḍukambale nikkhittajātimaṇi viya ca parisuddho.
anya-e0101n7:140_11: Tasmā vijjamānattā parisuddhattā ca ehipassavidhiṁ arahatīti ehipassiko.
anya-e0101n7:141_4: ādittaṁ celaṁ vā sīsaṁ vā ajjhupekkhitvāpi bhāvanāvasena attano citte upanayanaṁ arahatīti opanayiko.
anya-e0101n7:141_7: Asaṅkhate pana attano cittena upanayanaṁ arahatīti opaneyyiko.
anya-e0101n7:142_0: Atha vā nibbānaṁ upanetīti ariyamaggo upaneyyo.
anya-e0101n7:143_0: 152.Paccattaṁ veditabbo viññūhīti sabbehipi ugghaṭitaññūādīhi viññūhi attani attani veditabbo “bhāvito me maggo,
anya-e0101n7:143_3: Na hi upajjhāyena bhāvitena maggena saddhivihārikassa kilesā pahīyanti,
anya-e0101n7:143_6: Tasmā na esa parassa sīse ābharaṇaṁ viya daṭṭhabbo,
anya-e0101n7:145_1: Tassevaṁ svākkhātatādibhede dhammaguṇe anussarato neva tasmiṁ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṁ cittaṁ hoti.
anya-e0101n7:145_4: Ujugatamevassa tasmiṁ samaye cittaṁ hoti dhammaṁ ārabbhāti purimanayeneva vikkhambhitanīvaraṇassa ekakkhaṇe jhānaṅgāni uppajjanti.
anya-e0101n7:145_5: Dhammaguṇānaṁ pana gambhīratāya nānappakāraguṇānussaraṇādhimuttatāya vā appanaṁ appatvā upacārappattameva jhānaṁ hoti.
anya-e0101n7:145_6: Tadetaṁ dhammaguṇānussaraṇavasena uppannattā dhammānussaticceva saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
anya-e0101n7:146_0: Imañca pana dhammānussatiṁ anuyutto bhikkhu evaṁ opaneyyikassa dhammassa desetāraṁ imināpaṅgena samannāgataṁ satthāraṁ neva atītaṁse samanupassāmi,
anya-e0101n7:146_1: na panetarahi aññatra tena bhagavatāti evaṁ dhammaguṇadassaneneva satthari sagāravo hoti sappatisso.
anya-e0101n7:146_7: dhammaguṇānussatiyā ajjhāvutthañcassa sarīrampi cetiyagharamiva pūjārahaṁ hoti,
anya-e0101n7:146_9: vītikkamitabbavatthusamāyoge cassa dhammasudhammataṁ samanussarato hirottappaṁ paccupaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0101n7:151_1: Saṅghānussatiṁ bhāvetukāmenāpi rahogatena paṭisallīnena “suppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho,
anya-e0101n7:151_10: anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassā”ti evaṁ ariyasaṅghaguṇā anussaritabbā.
anya-e0101n7:152_2: sammāpaṭipadaṁ anivattipaṭipadaṁ anulomapaṭipadaṁ apaccanīkapaṭipadaṁ dhammānudhammapaṭipadaṁ paṭipannoti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0101n7:152_6: Yasmā pana sā sammāpaṭipadā uju avaṅkā akuṭilā ajimhā,
anya-e0101n7:152_9: Tasmā tampaṭipanno ariyasaṅgho ujuppaṭipanno ñāyappaṭipanno sāmīcippaṭipannotipi vutto.
anya-e0101n7:153_3: te sammāpaṭipadāya adhigantabbassa adhigatattā atītaṁ paṭipadaṁ sandhāya suppaṭipannāti veditabbā.
anya-e0101n7:154_0: Apica svākkhāte dhammavinaye yathānusiṭṭhaṁ paṭipannattāpi apaṇṇakapaṭipadaṁ paṭipannattāpi suppaṭipanno.
anya-e0101n7:155_0: Majjhimāya paṭipadāya antadvayamanupagamma paṭipannattā kāyavacīmanovaṅkakuṭilajimhadosappahānāya paṭipannattā ca ujuppaṭipannattā ca ujuppaṭipanno.
anya-e0101n7:156_0: Ñāyo vuccati nibbānaṁ. Tadatthāya paṭipannattā ñāyappaṭipanno.
anya-e0101n7:157_0: Yathā paṭipannā sāmīcippaṭipannārahā honti, tathā paṭipannattā sāmīcippaṭipanno.
anya-e0101n7:158_1: Cattāri purisayugānīti yugaḷavasena paṭhamamaggaṭṭho phalaṭṭhoti idamekaṁ yugaḷanti evaṁ cattāri purisayugaḷāni honti.
anya-e0101n7:158_2: Aṭṭha purisapuggalāti purisapuggalavasena eko paṭhamamaggaṭṭho eko phalaṭṭhoti iminā nayena aṭṭheva purisapuggalā honti.
anya-e0101n7:158_3: Ettha ca purisoti vā puggaloti vā ekatthāni etāni padāni.
anya-e0101n7:158_5: Esa bhagavato sāvakasaṅghoti yānimāni yugavasena cattāri purisayugāni,
anya-e0101n7:158_11: Taṁ āhunaṁ paṭiggahetuṁ yutto tassa mahapphalakaraṇatoti āhuneyyo.
anya-e0101n7:158_12: Atha vā dūratopi āgantvā sabbasāpateyyampi ettha hunitabbanti āhavanīyo.
anya-e0101n7:158_14: Yo cāyaṁ brāhmaṇānaṁ āhavanīyo nāma aggi,
anya-e0101n7:159_0: “Yo ca vassasataṁ jantu, aggiṁ paricare vane;
anya-e0101n7:161_0: Sāyeva pūjanā seyyo, yañce vassasataṁ huta”nti. ;
anya-e0101n7:162_0: Tadetaṁ nikāyantare āhavanīyoti padaṁ idha āhuneyyoti iminā padena atthato ekaṁ.
anya-e0101n7:163_0: Pāhuneyyoti ettha pana pāhunaṁ vuccati disāvidisato āgatānaṁ piyamanāpānaṁ ñātimittānamatthāya sakkārena paṭiyattaṁ āgantukadānaṁ.
anya-e0101n7:163_1: Tampi ṭhapetvā te tathārūpe pāhunake saṅghasseva dātuṁ yuttaṁ,
anya-e0101n7:163_6: Evaṁ pāhunamassa dātuṁ yuttaṁ pāhunañca paṭiggahetuṁ yuttoti pāhuneyyo.
anya-e0101n7:163_9: tasmā sabbapaṭhamaṁ ānetvā ettha hunitabbanti pāhavanīyo.
anya-e0101n7:164_0: Dakkhiṇāti pana paralokaṁ saddahitvā dātabbadānaṁ vuccati.
anya-e0101n7:164_2: dakkhiṇāya vā hito yasmā naṁ mahapphalakaraṇatāya visodhetīti dakkhiṇeyyo.
anya-e0101n7:165_0: Ubho hatthe sirasmiṁ patiṭṭhapetvā sabbalokena kayiramānaṁ añjalikammaṁ arahatīti añjalikaraṇīyo.
anya-e0101n7:166_0: Anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassāti sabbalokassa asadisaṁ puññavirūhanaṭṭhānaṁ.
anya-e0101n7:166_1: Yathā hi rañño vā amaccassa vā sālīnaṁ vā yavānaṁ vā virūhanaṭṭhānaṁ rañño sālikkhettaṁ rañño yavakkhettanti vuccati,
anya-e0101n7:166_3: Saṅghaṁ nissāya hi lokassa nānappakārahitasukhasaṁvattanikāni puññāni virūhanti.
anya-e0101n7:167_1: Evaṁ suppaṭipannatādibhede saṅghaguṇe anussarato neva tasmiṁ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṁ cittaṁ hoti.
anya-e0101n7:167_4: Ujugatamevassa tasmiṁ samaye cittaṁ hoti saṅghaṁ ārabbhāti purimanayeneva vikkhambhitanīvaraṇassa ekakkhaṇe jhānaṅgāni uppajjanti.
anya-e0101n7:167_5: Saṅghaguṇānaṁ pana gambhīratāya nānappakāraguṇānussaraṇādhimuttatāya vā appanaṁ appatvā upacārappattameva jhānaṁ hoti.
anya-e0101n7:167_6: Tadetaṁ saṅghaguṇānussaraṇavasena uppannattā saṅghānussaticceva saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
anya-e0101n7:168_0: Imañca pana saṅghānussatiṁ anuyutto bhikkhu saṅghe sagāravo hoti sappatisso.
anya-e0101n7:168_6: Saṅghaguṇānussatiyā ajjhāvutthañcassa sarīraṁ sannipatitasaṅghamiva uposathāgāraṁ pūjārahaṁ hoti,
anya-e0101n7:168_8: vītikkamitabbavatthusamāyoge cassa sammukhā saṅghaṁ passato viya hirottappaṁ paccupaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0101n7:173_1: Sīlānussatiṁ bhāvetukāmena pana rahogatena paṭisallīnena “aho vata me sīlāni akhaṇḍāni acchiddāni asabalāni
anya-e0101n7:173_2: akammāsāni bhujissāni viññuppasatthāni aparāmaṭṭhāni samādhisaṁvattanikānī”ti evaṁ akhaṇḍatādiguṇavasena
anya-e0101n7:174_1: yesaṁ ādimhi vā ante vā ekampi na bhinnaṁ,
anya-e0101n7:174_2: tāni pariyante chinnasāṭako viya na khaṇḍānīti akhaṇḍāni.
anya-e0101n7:174_4: tāni majjhe vinividdhasāṭako viya na chiddānīti acchiddāni.
anya-e0101n7:174_5: Yesaṁ paṭipāṭiyā dve vā tīṇi vā na bhinnāni,
anya-e0101n7:174_6: tāni piṭṭhiyā vā kucchiyā vā uṭṭhitena dīghavaṭṭādisaṇṭhānena visabhāgavaṇṇena kāḷarattādīnaṁ aññatarasarīravaṇṇā gāvī viya na sabalānīti asabalāni.
anya-e0101n7:174_8: tāni visabhāgabinduvicitrā gāvī viya na kammāsānīti akammāsāni.
anya-e0101n7:174_9: Avisesena vā sabbānipi sattavidhena methunasaṁyogena kodhupanāhādīhi ca pāpadhammehi anupahatattā akhaṇḍāni acchiddāni asabalāni akammāsāni.
anya-e0101n7:174_12: Taṇhādiṭṭhīhi aparāmaṭṭhatāya kenaci vā ayaṁ te sīlesu dosoti evaṁ parāmaṭṭhuṁ asakkuṇeyyatāya aparāmaṭṭhāni.
anya-e0101n7:174_14: atha vā pana maggasamādhiṁ phalasamādhiñcāpi saṁvattentīti samādhisaṁvattanikāni.
anya-e0101n7:175_1: Evaṁ akhaṇḍatādiguṇavasena attano sīlāni anussarato nevassa tasmiṁ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṁ cittaṁ hoti.
anya-e0101n7:175_5: sīlaṁ ārabbhāti purimanayeneva vikkhambhitanīvaraṇassa ekakkhaṇe jhānaṅgāni uppajjanti.
anya-e0101n7:175_6: Sīlaguṇānaṁ pana gambhīratāya nānappakāraguṇānussaraṇādhimuttatāya vā appanaṁ appatvā upacārappattameva jhānaṁ hoti.
anya-e0101n7:175_7: Tadetaṁ sīlaguṇānussaraṇavasena uppannattā sīlānussaticceva saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
anya-e0101n7:176_0: Imañca pana sīlānussatiṁ anuyutto bhikkhu sikkhāya sagāravo hoti sabhāgavutti,
anya-e0101n7:181_1: Cāgānussatiṁ bhāvetukāmena pana pakatiyā cāgādhimuttena niccappavattadānasaṁvibhāgena bhavitabbaṁ.
anya-e0101n7:181_2: Atha vā pana bhāvanaṁ ārabhantena ito dāni pabhuti sati paṭiggāhake antamaso ekālopamattampi dānaṁ adatvā
anya-e0101n7:181_3: na bhuñjissāmīti samādānaṁ katvā taṁdivasaṁ guṇavisiṭṭhesu paṭiggāhakesu yathāsatti yathābalaṁ dānaṁ
anya-e0101n7:181_4: datvā tattha nimittaṁ gaṇhitvā rahogatena paṭisallīnena “lābhā vata me suladdhaṁ vata me,
anya-e0101n7:181_5: yohaṁ maccheramalapariyuṭṭhitāya pajāya vigatamalamaccherena cetasā viharāmi muttacāgo payatapāṇi vossaggarato
anya-e0101n7:181_6: yācayogo dānasaṁvibhāgarato”ti evaṁ vigatamalamaccheratādiguṇavasena attano cāgo anussaritabbo.
anya-e0101n7:182_0: Tattha lābhā vata meti mayhaṁ vata lābhā,
anya-e0101n7:182_1: ye ime “āyuṁ kho pana datvā āyussa bhāgī hoti dibbassa vā mānusassa vā” iti ca,
anya-e0101n7:182_2: “dadaṁ piyo hoti bhajanti naṁ bahū” iti ca,
anya-e0101n7:182_4: sataṁ dhammaṁ anukkamaṁ” iti ca evamādīhi nayehi bhagavatā dāyakassa lābhā saṁvaṇṇitā,
anya-e0101n7:182_6: Suladdhaṁ vata meti yaṁ mayā idaṁ sāsanaṁ manussattaṁ vā laddhaṁ,
anya-e0101n7:183_2: Tasmā attano sampattīnaṁ parasādhāraṇabhāvamasahanalakkhaṇena cittassa pabhassarabhāvadūsakānaṁ kaṇhadhammānaṁ
anya-e0101n7:183_3: aññatarena maccheramalena abhibhūtesu sattesūti ayamettha attho.
anya-e0101n7:183_4: Vigatamalamaccherenāti aññesampi rāgadosādimalānañceva maccherassa ca vigatattā vigatamalamaccherena.
anya-e0101n7:183_5: Cetasā viharāmīti yathāvuttappakāracitto hutvā vasāmīti attho.
anya-e0101n7:183_6: Suttesu pana mahānāmasakkassa sotāpannassa sato nissayavihāraṁ pucchato nissayavihāravasena desitattā agāraṁ ajjhāvasāmīti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0101n7:184_2: Sakkaccaṁ sahatthā deyyadhammaṁ dātuṁ sadā dhotahatthoyevāti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0101n7:184_10: Dānasaṁvibhāgaratoti dāne ca saṁvibhāge ca rato.
anya-e0101n7:184_13: ettheva casmi ubhaye ratoti evaṁ anussaratīti attho.
anya-e0101n7:185_1: Tassevaṁ vigatamalamaccheratādiguṇavasena attano cāgaṁ anussarato neva tasmiṁ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṁ cittaṁ hoti.
anya-e0101n7:185_4: Ujugatamevassa tasmiṁ samaye cittaṁ hoti cāgaṁ ārabbhāti purimanayeneva vikkhambhitanīvaraṇassa ekakkhaṇe jhānaṅgāni uppajjanti.
anya-e0101n7:185_5: Cāgaguṇānaṁ pana gambhīratāya nānappakāracāgaguṇānussaraṇādhimuttatāya vā appanaṁ appatvā upacārappattameva jhānaṁ hoti.
anya-e0101n7:185_6: Tadetaṁ cāgaguṇānussaraṇavasena uppannattā cāgānussaticceva saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
anya-e0101n7:186_0: Imañca pana cāgānussatiṁ anuyutto bhikkhu bhiyyoso mattāya cāgādhimutto hoti,
anya-e0101n7:191_1: Devatānussatiṁ bhāvetukāmena pana ariyamaggavasena samudāgatehi saddhādīhi guṇehi samannāgatena bhavitabbaṁ.
anya-e0101n7:191_8: yathārūpāya saddhāya samannāgatā tā devatā ito cutā tattha upapannā,
anya-e0101n7:191_13: Yathārūpāya paññāya samannāgatā tā devatā ito cutā tattha upapannā,
anya-e0101n7:191_14: mayhampi tathārūpā paññā saṁvijjatī”ti evaṁ devatā sakkhiṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā attano saddhādiguṇā anussaritabbā.
anya-e0101n7:192_0: Sutte pana yasmiṁ mahānāma samaye ariyasāvako attano ca tāsañca devatānaṁ saddhañca sīlañca sutañca cāgañca paññañca anussarati,
anya-e0101n7:192_1: nevassa tasmiṁ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṁ cittaṁ hotīti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0101n7:192_3: atha kho taṁ sakkhiṭṭhāne ṭhapetabbadevatānaṁ attano saddhādīhi samānaguṇadīpanatthaṁ vuttanti veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0101n7:192_4: Aṭṭhakathāyañhi devatā sakkhiṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā attano guṇe anussaratīti daḷhaṁ katvā vuttaṁ.
anya-e0101n7:193_1: Tasmā pubbabhāge devatānaṁ guṇe anussaritvā aparabhāge attano saṁvijjamāne saddhādiguṇe anussarato cassa
anya-e0101n7:193_2: neva tasmiṁ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṁ cittaṁ hoti.
anya-e0101n7:193_5: ujugatamevassa tasmiṁ samaye cittaṁ hoti devatā ārabbhāti purimanayeneva vikkhambhitanīvaraṇassa ekakkhaṇe jhānaṅgāni uppajjanti.
anya-e0101n7:193_6: Saddhādiguṇānaṁ pana gambhīratāya nānappakāraguṇānussaraṇādhimuttatāya vā appanaṁ appatvā upacārappattameva jhānaṁ hoti.
anya-e0101n7:193_7: Tadetaṁ devatānaṁ guṇasadisasaddhādiguṇānussaraṇavasena devatānussaticceva saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
anya-e0101n7:194_0: Imañca pana devatānussatiṁ anuyutto bhikkhu devatānaṁ piyo hoti manāpo,
anya-e0101n7:199_1: Yaṁ pana etāsaṁ vitthāradesanāyaṁ “ujugatamevassa tasmiṁ samaye cittaṁ hoti tathāgataṁ ārabbhā”tiādīni vatvā “ujugatacitto kho pana, mahānāma,
anya-e0101n7:199_6: tattha itipi so bhagavātiādīnaṁ atthaṁ nissāya uppannaṁ tuṭṭhiṁ sandhāya labhati atthavedanti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0101n7:199_7: Pāḷiṁ nissāya uppannaṁ tuṭṭhiṁ sandhāya labhati dhammavedaṁ.
anya-e0101n7:199_8: Ubhayavasena labhati dhammūpasaṁhitaṁ pāmojjanti vuttanti veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0101n7:200_1: taṁ pubbabhāge devatā ārabbha pavattacittavasena devatāguṇasadise vā devatābhāvanipphādake guṇe ārabbha pavattacittavasena vuttanti veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0101n7:201_1: Imā pana cha anussatiyo ariyasāvakānaññeva ijjhanti.
anya-e0101n7:201_6: Mahānāmasutte ca sotāpannassa nissayavihāraṁ puṭṭhena bhagavatā sotāpannassa nissayavihāradassanatthameva etā vitthārato kathitā.
anya-e0101n7:202_4: ujugatamevassa tasmiṁ samaye cittaṁ hoti nikkhantaṁ muttaṁ vuṭṭhitaṁ gedhamhā.
anya-e0101n7:202_10: ārammaṇaṁ karitvā evamidhekacce sattā visujjhantī”ti evaṁ ariyasāvakassa anussativasena cittaṁ visodhetvā
anya-e0101n7:203_0: Āyasmatā mahākaccānena desite sambādhokāsasuttepi “acchariyaṁ, āvuso, abbhutaṁ, āvuso,
anya-e0101n7:203_1: yāvañcidaṁ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena sambādhe okāsādhigamo anubuddho sattānaṁ visuddhiyā…pe…
anya-e0101n7:203_5: evamidhekacce sattā visuddhidhammā bhavantī”ti evaṁ ariyasāvakasseva paramatthavisuddhidhammatāya okāsādhigamavasena kathitā.
anya-e0101n7:204_3: cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanā hoti. Kathañca, visākhe,
anya-e0101n7:204_4: upakkiliṭṭhassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanā hoti? Idha, visākhe,
anya-e0101n7:204_5: ariyasāvako tathāgataṁ anussaratī”ti evaṁ ariyasāvakasseva uposathaṁ upavasato cittavisodhanakammaṭṭhānavasena
anya-e0101n7:205_8: pañcasu dhammesu patiṭṭhāya cha dhamme uttari bhāveyyāsi.
anya-e0101n7:205_10: tathāgataṁ anussareyyāsi itipi so bhagavā”ti evaṁ ariyasāvakasseva “tesaṁ no, bhante,
anya-e0101n7:205_11: nānāvihārena viharataṁ kenassa vihārena viharitabba”nti pucchato vihāradassanatthaṁ kathitā.
anya-e0101n7:206_1: Evaṁ santepi parisuddhasīlādiguṇasamannāgatena puthujjanenāpi manasi kātabbā.
anya-e0101n7:206_2: Anussavavasenāpi hi buddhādīnaṁ guṇe anussarato cittaṁ pasīdatiyeva.
anya-e0101n7:206_3: Yassānubhāvena nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhetvā uḷārapāmojjo vipassanaṁ ārabhitvā arahattaṁyeva sacchikareyya kaṭaandhakāravāsī phussadevatthero viya.
anya-e0101n7:207_0: So kirāyasmā mārena nimmitaṁ buddharūpaṁ disvā “ayaṁ tāva sarāgadosamoho evaṁ sobhati,
anya-e0101n7:207_1: kathaṁ nu kho bhagavā na sobhati,
anya-e0101n7:207_2: so hi sabbaso vītarāgadosamoho”ti buddhārammaṇaṁ pītiṁ paṭilabhitvā vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇīti.
